fullplot: When Victor and his family move into his grand-uncle's mysterious - and seemingly haunted - mansion, the young boy detective makes it his mission to solve the case of a girl who went missing there forty years earlier.
plot: When Victor and his family move into his grand-uncle's mysterious - and seemingly haunted - mansion, the young boy detective makes it his mission to solve the case of a girl who went missing there forty years earlier.
title: Victor and the Secret of Crocodile Mansion
